name: 黃瀅瑛
objective:
此概論課程將介紹虛擬實境（VR）及擴增實境（AR）相關技術於現今智慧製造與服務業之應用，並於理論課程之外安排數個實習單元，針對不同技術開發於工作環境及其設計之應用做實作演練。課程中將介紹並展示虛擬實境及擴增實境於不同工作環境及其設計之應用實例，包括：VR/AR軟硬體操作及體驗、各式追蹤系統介紹與實作（如眼睛追蹤、肢體動作追蹤、手勢追蹤）、VR/AR相關產業之參訪或演講等等。本課程旨在使學生了解如何將虛擬實境及擴增實境之技術運用在實際工作環境、產品及系統設計，以因應產業趨勢及就業競爭力之提升。
The introductory course gives an overview about VR (virtual reality) and AR (augmented reality) technology applied in different workspace and its designs. Various applications and examples of VR and AR applied in workspace design will be demonstrated. The goal of this course is to empower students in learning and applying the practical uses of AR (Augmented Reality) and VR (Virtual Reality) technology applied in manufacturing and workspace design. The practice sessions include: C#/Java programming, experimental design of human-machine-interaction (HMI) systems, basic training and application of Unity, various tracking systems, etc.
schedule:
week 01: Course introduction & announcement
week 02 - 03: VR/AR technology
week 04 - 05: Exercise session: 3D software
week 06 - 07: Demonstration of VR/AR applications
week 08 - 09: Exercise session: VR software
week 10: HMI
week 11: UE/UX
week 12 - 14: Various tracking technology
week 15: Eye/gesture tracking applications
week 16 - 18: Group project presentations
scorePolicy:
Course participation/performance: 30%
Midterm exam or assignment: 30%
Final exam or project: 40%
